original_title: The Wiggles: Racing to the Rainbow
overview: Captain Feathersword challenges his friends to a race, to find who can reach the end of the rainbow first. The Captain departs with his crew aboard the S.S. Feathersword, while The Wiggles travel by road in their Big Red Car. Dorothy, Wags and Henry The Octopus take to the air in their giant hot air balloon.
title: The Wiggles: Racing to the Rainbow
